analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs /
translated: The ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs /
translated: Similarly, a stream enterer is non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong @285b ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong @285b ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs /
translated: A once-returner, a non-returner, a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha, a bodhisattva, and a tathÄgata, worthy one, perfectly complete buddha are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang; rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang; rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /
translated: Similarly, because of being utterly pure, the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, arhatship, individual enlightenment, the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects are non-apprehensible.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba med pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba med pa mi dmigs /
translated: Because of being utterly pure, non-production is non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Similarly, because of being utterly pure,

original: 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa mi dmigs /
translated: cessation, non-affliction, purification, and the absence of anything to be appropriated are non-apprehensible.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: Because of being utterly pure, the past limit is non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba mi dmigs /
translated: Similarly, because of being utterly pure, the future limit and the present are non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba mi dmigs /
translated: In the same way, because of being extremely pure, coming, going, staying, dying, being reborn,

original: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and increasing and decreasing are not apprehended.

original: gang dmigs su med pas thams cad mi dmigs she na /
analyzed: gang dmigs su med pas thams cad mi dmigs she na /
translated: Why is everything not apprehended because of not apprehending anything?

original: chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not apprehended because of not apprehending the realm of phenomena.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pas chos kyi dbyings mi @286a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pas chos kyi dbyings mi @286a *//
translated: SubhÅ«ti, the realm of phenomena is not apprehended because of not apprehending the realm of phenomena.

original: dmigs so // skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dmigs su med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dmigs so // skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dmigs su med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Non-arising, non-cessation, non-affliction, non-purification, and non-conditioning are not apprehended because of not apprehending non-conditioning.

original: de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pas de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pas de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: Suchness is not apprehended because of not apprehending suchness.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs so //
translated: The very limit of reality is not apprehended because the very limit of reality is non-apprehensible.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //ğŸ”½tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pas /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pas /
translated: The perfection of giving is not apprehended because the perfection of giving is non-apprehensible.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so //ğŸ”½nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pas nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so // nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pas nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are not apprehended because the perfection of wisdom is non-apprehensible.ğŸ”½The emptiness of internal phenomena is not apprehended because the emptiness of internal phenomena is non-apprehensible.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not apprehended because the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is non-apprehensible.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of the applications of mindfulness.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang; rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dmigs su med pas lam mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang; rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dmigs su med pas lam mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the limbs of awakening, and the path are non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of the path.

original: de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa @286b bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa @286b bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med pas rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med pas rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The stream enterer is non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dmigs su med pas dgra bcom pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dmigs su med pas dgra bcom pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The once-returner, the non-returner, and the worthy one are non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a worthy one.

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med pas rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so //
translated: The pratyekabuddha is non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a pratyekabuddha.ğŸ”½The bodhisattva is non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of a bodhisattva.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang; lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dmigs su med pas sangs rgyas nyid mi dmigs so //

translated: The fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, arhatship, individual enlightenment, and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening are non-apprehensible, therefore unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is non-apprehensible.

analyzed: de bzhin du sa dmigs su med pas rab tu dga' ba'i sa mi dmigs so //
